===United States===
===United States===
â
On July 26, 2010, the U.S. Copyright office announced a new exemption making it officially legal<ref name="U.S. Copyright Office">[http://www.copyright.gov/1201/] Rule making on Exemptions from Prohibition on Circumvention of Technological Measures that Control Access to Copyrighted Works.</ref> to root a device and run unauthorized third-party applications, as well as the ability to unlock any cell phone for use on multiple carriers.
+
On July 26, 2010, the U.S. Copyright office announced a new exemption making it officially legal<ref name="U.S. Copyright Office">[http://www.copyright.gov/1201/] Rule making on Exemptions from Prohibition on Circumvention of Technological Measures that Control Access to Copyrighted Works.</ref> to root a device and run unauthorized third-party applications, as well as the ability to [[SIM lock|unlock any cell phone for use on multiple carriers]].
